p: Mouse IFNγ enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA) MAX ™ kits (BioLegend) and the bead-based immunoassay LEGENDplex ™ Mouse Inflammation Panel (13-plex, BioLegend) were used to quantify IFNγ and other cytokine levels in the BALF according to the manufacturer’s instructions. The bead-based immunoassay LEGENDplex Mouse Pro-inflammation Chemokine Panel (13-plex, BioLegend) was used to quantify multiple chemokine levels in the BALF.
